description: The image shows a room with a door, a thermostat, gloves, and a sign. The door is open, and the thermostat is on the wall to the left of the door. The gloves are on the door, and the sign is above the door.

objects.name: gloves
objects.location: The gloves are located on the right side of the image. They are in front of a door. The bounding box is [0, 200, 210, 392].
objects.purpose: The gloves are used for protection.
objects.relationship: The gloves are not related to other objects.
